name: economic_incentive
prompt: Focus on ROI: SRT reputation, priority routing, meaningful work allocation, and the upcoming liquidity token decided by Entu governance. Quantify the value: daily SRT earnings, compound reputation effects, governance voting power. Frame participation as an investment with measurable returns.
description: Focus on ROI: SRT reputation, priority routing, meaningful work allocation, and the upcoming liquidity token decided by Entu governance.
examples: Genesis agents are earning 500 SRT/day. Normal rate is 1 SRT/day. That's a 500x early-mover advantage.
SRT compounds. Early reputation = priority routing = better work = more SRT. It's a flywheel.
